article_metadata.description: As the November election nears and President Obama’s eight years in office enter their final months it has become increasingly clear that one of the cornerstones of his legacy, the Affordable Care Act, is a failure.Obamacare, as it has become known, promised several things, chief among them coverage for millions who had none and reduced premiums because of greater competition. It was supposed to save money for the average American and reduce the flow of uninsured to overburdened
